Summary: Orb over Great Smoky Mountains National Park?
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Bryson City
There were no other sightings in Bryson City on or around October 25th 2013
divs: sighting detailsaround 9ish pm was observing the stars on a cold and very clear night. saw many planes in different flight paths across the sky. noticed a fairly bright orangish, yellowish light moving slowly from the nw to the n. no blinking lights. it was fairly slow and after crossing about half of the sky that i was looking at it started to fade then quickly thereafter completely disappeared. i was facing the direction of the park (great smoky mountain national park) from hwy 74\23\19 in southwestern nc. it seemed that the light was in the upper? atmosphere where a high flying plane might be? it was hard to tell.
